# 40Ca(0+) -- AV18+UIX -- 16-Mar-17

# CVMC  8M samples using 200 gauss points in r out to 20.00 fm

# K = momentum in 1/fm
# RHOKP = proton momentum distribution in fm**3
# DRHOKP = Monte Carlo error bar (1 sigma)

# Normalization
# 4*PI*TOTINT(RHOKP*K**2:K)/(2*PI)**3 = 20
# 4*PI*TOTINT(DRHOKP*K**2:K)/(2*PI)**3 =  .17568

# number above K =  2 fm**-1
# 4*PI*TOTINT(RHOKP(I)*K(I)**2:K(I))/(2*PI)**3 =  1.453
# 4*PI*TOTINT(DRHOKP(I)*K(I)**2:K(I))/(2*PI)**3 =  .089762

# Kinetic energy
# HSQON2M*4*PI*TOTINT((RHOKP+RHOKN)*K**4:K)/(2*PI)**3 = 1212.6
# HSQON2M*4*PI*TOTINT((DRHOKP+DRHOKN)*K**4:K)/(2*PI)**3 =  64.126

# Kinetic energy above K =  2 fm**-1
# HSQON2M*4*PI*TOTINT((RHOKP(I)+RHOKN(I))*K(I)**4:K(I))/(2*PI)**3 =  628.72
# HSQON2M*4*PI*TOTINT((DRHOKP(I)+DRHOKN(I))*K(I)**4:K(I))/(2*PI)**3 =  58.416
 
#   K       RHOKP        DRHOKP
# *****   **********   **********
